attributes.action: To Review the Criminal Legal aid system of means testing Defendants, which reduce access to justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Defendants are now in Magistrates Court means tested as to whether they should be given legal represetation.  This, the government boasts, has saved over £80 million, but at what price?  How many wrongfull convictions are made becasue someone has just passed the threshold and is unable to afford their own representation? This could happen to anyone.  The government are considering extending this to the Crown Court.  This must not happen.
